torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with sergal fur. [npc.Her] new fur is a little thin and soft around [npc.her] joints and is quite densely packed for added protection.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSergalSlate(sergal)], [npc.skinFullDescription].
